from sklearn.cross_validation import train_test_split

x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(c.fillna(0).as_matrix(), i_2.sex, test_size=0.4)
x_test, x_val, y_test, y_val = train_test_split(x_test, y_test, test_size=0.5)

v = 3000;
classifier = RandomForestClassifier(n_estimators = v, max_features = 'sqrt', max_depth=10)
#classifier = RandomForestClassifier(n_estimators = v, n_jobs=-1)
classifier.fit(x_train, y_train)
classifier.score(x_val, y_val) * 100
